about_the_game:
THE MATTER OF THE GAME


It is also about the married couple Mira and Serhat.
Mira's older sister Emma is very ill, and priest Lorenzo initiates an exorcism.
The priest believes that the devil's spirit has taken over Emma's illness.
The ritual fails. Serhat has problems with insomnia that day, he uses sleeping pills. and when you wake up
He can't see his wife next to Mira.
Will he find his wife Mira?
Can he defeat the devil?

ENVIRONMENT


In the home environment, it offers an atmosphere of loneliness, tension, and mystery,
The story blending fear and excitement offers an atmosphere.

IMMORTALITY:


Our goal is a game.
affects and disturbs sound and events.
There is a room where you can get in-game hints.

WARNING:


sound and image are disturbing.
Sudden visuals cause panic attacks.

IMPORTANT NOTE:

The characters are fictitious.
It does not contain moments, contrary, ulterior motives, humiliation, abuse!

name: the DEEP LOST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: SOUND
  • Additional Notes: The DEEP LOST Unreal® Engine motorunu kullanır.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ rx 580 8 GB or Geforce Gtx 1060 6gb Gddr5
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: SOUND
  • Additional Notes: The DEEP LOST Unreal® Engine motorunu kullanır.

short_description: the DEEP LOST is a first-person psychological horror game.story driven, able to experience interiors, suspense and fear.It offers mystery, curiosity and discovery together with its visually dynamic atmosphere.There will be moments of horror.
